reviewText: High quality girls, as always, from Playboy.  There are better, but not much, and not many.

I like most of the Playboy Exposed series because of their usually realistic settings, but I don't much care for ALL AMERICAN GIRLS. To begin with, since these girls are dancing on stage in Daytona, Florida in what looks like Spring Break shenanegans, why do most of them not even get topless?? Instead, this DVD is clips from several wet t-shirt contests, so at least you can usually see through their shirts. Even if you love wet t-shirt contests, a lot of this is not filmed decently either. One segment looks like the camera guy was far off with his telephoto lens extended to the wobbly maximum, and in that segment as well as some others the one camera was in a bad location too. (Yes, these usually appear to just have one camera filming.) One segment toward the end is filmed a lot better than the others, and it's the main place on here that several girls DO briefly get topless, or even pull their thongs off. Another problem is that much of the time the weather was overcast or maybe raining slightly, which casts a pall over the whole affair. Thus, I do NOT recommend ALL AMERICAN GIRLS. Some of the better DVDs in the Playboy Exposed series are Playboy Exposed - Girls of Motorcross,Playboy Exposed - Amanda's Naughty Pool Party,Playboy Exposed Confessions of a Party Girl, and BACHELORETTE PARTY EXPOSED.

THIS IS COLLECTION OF PLAYMATES AND OTHER MODELS IN AND OUT OF UNIFORMS EACH SEGMENT HAS A BRIEF INTERVIEW, IT SHOWS THEM DOING THEIR JOBS AND THEN THE GIRLS SLOWLY UNDRESS, UNIFORMS FEATURED INCLUDE A NURSE, LIFEGUARD, PARK RANGER, POLICEWOMAN, AIR LINE STEWARDES, AND MY PERSONAL FAVORITE A AIR FORCE PILOT (FEATURING DAPHNE) AND ALTHOUGH I SERIOUSLY DOUBT ANY OF THE MODELS ARE ACTUALLY WHAT THEY CLAIM TO BE IT REALLY DOESN'T MATTER ALL THE GIRLS ARE BEAUTIFUL AND ALL HAVE FULL NUDITY
  RANDY
